verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. I waited <WH6960> patiently <WH6960> for Jehovah <WH3068>; And he inclined <WH5186> unto me <WH8085>, and heard my cry <WH7775>.

He brought me up <WH5927> also out of a horrible <WH7588> pit <WH953>, out of the miry <WH3121> clay <WH2916>; And he set <WH6965> my feet <WH7272> upon a rock <WH5553>, and established <WH3559> my goings <WH838>.

And he hath put <WH5414> a new <WH2319> song <WH7892> in my mouth <WH6310>, even praise <WH8416> unto our God <WH430>: Many <WH7227> shall see <WH7200> it <WH3372>, and fear, And shall trust <WH982> in Jehovah <WH3068>.
Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH1397> that maketh <WH7760> Jehovah <WH3068> his trust <WH4009>, And respecteth <WH6437> not the proud <WH7295>, nor such as turn aside <WH7750> to lies <WH3577>.

Many <WH7227>, O Jehovah <WH3068> my God <WH430>, are the wonderful <WH6381> works which thou hast done <WH6213>, And thy thoughts <WH4284> which are to us-ward <WH6186>; They cannot be set in order unto thee <WH5046>; If I would declare and speak <WH1696> of them <WH6105>, They are more than can be numbered <WH5608>.

Sacrifice <WH2077> and offering <WH4503> thou hast no delight <WH2654> in <WH241>; Mine ears hast thou opened <WH3738>: Burnt-offering <WH5930> and sin-offering <WH5930> hast thou not required <WH7592>.
Then said <WH559> I <WH935>, Lo, I am come; In the roll <WH4039> of the book <WH5612> it is written of me <WH3789>:
I delight <WH2654> to do <WH6213> thy will <WH7522>, O my God <WH430>; Yea <WH8451>, thy law is within <WH8432> my heart <WH4578>.
I have proclaimed <WH1319> glad tidings of righteousness <WH6664> in the great <WH7227> assembly <WH6951>; Lo <WH3607>, I will not refrain my lips <WH8193>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, thou knowest <WH3045>.

I have not hid <WH3680> thy righteousness <WH6666> within <WH8432> my heart <WH3820>; I have declared <WH559> thy faithfulness <WH530> and thy salvation <WH8668>; I have not concealed <WH3582> thy lovingkindness <WH2617> and thy truth <WH571> from the great <WH7227> assembly <WH6951>.
Withhold <WH3607> not thou thy tender mercies <WH7356> from me <WH3068>, O Jehovah; Let thy lovingkindness <WH2617> and thy truth <WH571> continually <WH8548> preserve me <WH5341>.

For innumerable <WH4557> evils <WH7451> have compassed <WH661> me about <WH5771>; Mine iniquities have overtaken <WH5381> me <WH3201>, so that I am not able to look up <WH7200>; They are more <WH6105> than the hairs <WH8185> of my head <WH7218>; And my heart <WH3820> hath failed me <WH5800>.
Be pleased <WH7521>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, to deliver <WH5337> me <WH2363>: Make haste to help <WH5833> me <WH3068>, O Jehovah.

Let them be put to shame <WH954> and confounded <WH954> together <WH3162> That seek <WH1245> after my soul <WH5315> to destroy <WH5595> it <WH5472>: Let them be turned backward <WH268> and brought to dishonor <WH3637> That delight <WH2655> in my hurt <WH7451>.
Let them be desolate <WH8074> by reason <WH6118> of their shame <WH1322> That say <WH559> unto me <WH1889>, Aha, aha <WH1889>.

Let all those that seek <WH1245> thee rejoice <WH7797> and be glad <WH8055> in thee <WH157>: Let such as love thy salvation <WH8668> say <WH559> continually <WH8548>, Jehovah <WH3068> be magnified <WH1431>.
But I am poor <WH6041> and needy <WH34>; Yet the Lord <WH136> thinketh <WH2803> upon me <WH5833>: Thou art my help and my deliverer <WH6403>; Make no tarrying <WH309>, O my God <WH430>.
